verbs.description: McCain [V: had] indirectly dissed Trump in a speech denouncing " half - baked " nationalism .
[ARG0: McCain] had [ARGM-MNR: indirectly] [V: dissed] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in a speech denouncing " half - baked " nationalism] .
McCain had indirectly dissed Trump in [ARG0: a speech] [V: denouncing] [ARG1: " half - baked " nationalism] .
